channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 125: Raising Sons (Pt.1) Ft. Josiah/Levi/Simon Rock [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Join us for a special edition of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock as Aaron is joined by his 3 sons to talk about Father-Son relationships: What Aaron has learned as a father, what his sons learned growing up, and principles Aaron implemented to raise his children for Christ. 

More Resources: 

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Josiah Rock, Levi Rock, Simon Rock
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Josiah Rock, Levi Rock, Simon Rock

item.title: 124: 1 Million March 4 Children [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
This week, the 1 Million March 4 Children protests happened all across Canada protesting transition surgeries for minors, schools keeping secrets from parents about their child's sexuality, and males using female washrooms and vice verse. Listen in to Dr. Aaron Rock's experience with the march he attended, and more about the implications of the protest politically and culturally.

More Resources:

item.title: 123: Artificial Intelligenceâ€™s Dangerous Flaw [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this week's episode, Dr. Aaron Rock delves into Artificial Intelligence (AI) and speaks wisdom into how Christians should view it, how to address the problems we are already facing in culture and ones yet to come regarding AI.
